author: ceki
msg: - Fixed problem with StreamTokenizer which would incorrectly drop backslash '\' characters in quoted literals.
This means that real world patterns can be processed.
For example, one can now write "'message ~ 'hello\s*world'  "

author: ceki
msg: Added NULL support + associated test cases

author: ceki
msg: Added support for 'CLASS' and 'METHOD' field comparisons.  This took less than 10 minutes to implement (including the test cases).
